alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 1:42AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish through 215 AM CDT... At 141 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Moss Bluff, Carlyss, Toomey and Edgerly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 32. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southwestern Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
